languages.text: "Тогда поторопимся, элантах. Ты видел{mf||а} ужасы, что творятся в этом гнезде раздора и порока — наша задержка могла стоить провидцам не только их жизней... но и бессмертных душ".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда поторопимся, элантах. Ты видел{mf||а} ужасы, что творятся в этом гнезде раздора и порока — наша задержка могла стоить провидцам не только их жизней... но и бессмертных душ".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."
languages.original_text: "Тогда поторопимся, элантах. Ты видел{mf||а} ужасы, что творятся в этом гнезде раздора и порока — наша задержка могла стоить провидцам не только их жизней... но и бессмертных душ".

traits.locale_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Entonces apresurémonos, elantach. Ya has visto los horrores que se perpetran en este antro de inquina y corrupción. Nuestro retraso no solo podría costarles la vida a los videntes... sino también sus almas inmortales».
languages.original_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces apresurémonos, elantach. Ya has visto los horrores que se perpetran en este antro de inquina y corrupción. Nuestro retraso no solo podría costarles la vida a los videntes... sino también sus almas inmortales».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「では急ごう、エランタ。この争いと悪の巣窟の惨状を見ただろう。我々の行動の遅れは、先見司たちの命だけでなく…彼らの不滅の魂をも犠牲にしているかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."

traits.locale_text: 「では急ごう、エランタ。この争いと悪の巣窟の惨状を見ただろう。我々の行動の遅れは、先見司たちの命だけでなく…彼らの不滅の魂をも犠牲にしているかもしれない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “那我们得快点，外界人。在这冲突与罪恶的巢穴之中，亲眼目睹了这里发生的恐怖。如果我们磨蹭的话，那些先知可能会失去生命……还有他们不朽的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."

traits.locale_text: “那我们得快点，外界人。在这冲突与罪恶的巢穴之中，亲眼目睹了这里发生的恐怖。如果我们磨蹭的话，那些先知可能会失去生命……还有他们不朽的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Hâtons-nous, elantach. Vous avez vu les atrocités perpétrées dans cet antre de vice et de dissension. Notre retard a peut-être coûté leur vie aux Grands Prophètes... mais aussi leur âme immortelle. »
languages.original_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."

traits.locale_text: « Hâtons-nous, elantach. Vous avez vu les atrocités perpétrées dans cet antre de vice et de dissension. Notre retard a peut-être coûté leur vie aux Grands Prophètes... mais aussi leur âme immortelle. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wir müssen uns aber beeilen, Elantach. Ihr habt die Gräueltaten erlebt, die sich in diesem Unterschlupf des Unfriedens und der Untugend abspielen. Durch unsere Verspätung mussten die Runenpropheten nicht nur ihr Leben verlieren ... sondern vielleicht hat es sie auch ihre unsterblichen Seelen gekostet."
languages.original_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen uns aber beeilen, Elantach. Ihr habt die Gräueltaten erlebt, die sich in diesem Unterschlupf des Unfriedens und der Untugend abspielen. Durch unsere Verspätung mussten die Runenpropheten nicht nur ihr Leben verlieren ... sondern vielleicht hat es sie auch ihre unsterblichen Seelen gekostet."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "O hâlde elimizi çabuk tutalım elantach. Çatışmaların ve ahlaksızlığın inindeyiz. Burada ne tür dehşetler yaşandığını gördün. Ötesezenler, gecikmemizin bedelini yalnızca canlarıyla değil... Ölümsüz ruhlarıyla da ödemiş olabilirler."
languages.original_text: "Then let us make haste, elantach. You have seen the horrors going on in this den of strife and vice. Our delay may have cost the Farseers not just their lives... but their immortal souls as well."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde elimizi çabuk tutalım elantach. Çatışmaların ve ahlaksızlığın inindeyiz. Burada ne tür dehşetler yaşandığını gördün. Ötesezenler, gecikmemizin bedelini yalnızca canlarıyla değil... Ölümsüz ruhlarıyla da ödemiş olabilirler."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
